directions: Mix vegan mayonnaise, Dijon mustard, relish, sugar, onion powder, dill, salt, garlic powder, pepper, and paprika in a bowl until well combined. Add tofu and gently stir to completely coat.
ingredients: ¼ cup vegan mayonnaise (such as Follow Your Heart® Vegenaise®)
½ teaspoon black salt (kala namak), or more to taste
1 (14 ounce) package extra-firm tofu, cut into small cubes
title: Vegan Egg Salad
